revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Check Point L-50W.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Check Point L-50W Network Appliance |caption2 = with 8-Port Gigabit LAN Switch & 802.11N Wireless |pp = https://www.checkpoint.com/products/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Check_Point_L-50W |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Check Point |model = L-50 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = CPAP-SG1140/SG620 |page_start_date = 04/24/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Check_Point_L-50W |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = network security platform |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PZ7-67897 |icid = 9519B-67897 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U4G8F2DTR-BC; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU128M8HE-AC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E6171R; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1C:7F |oui = 48:A9:D2
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Check Point version: 983002045; |stockos = Linux;2.6.22.18;Check Point SecurePlatform Embedded;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, ExpressCard/34 (USB), SD Card slot |exp_expcard_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes, RJ45 console, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, metal case, heatsink, SD Card slot, |addchip = RS-232 transciever;Intersil;ICL3243E;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Hub Controller;NEC;μPD720114;;1;,,, 2-Wire RTC;Seiko;S-35390A;;1;,,, 3A Synchronous Step-Down Switcher w/Integrated FET;TI;TPS54327;;2;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;1;,,, 4.5V to 18V Input, Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;TI;TPS65251;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS9435A;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = SG80A |manuf_rev = L-50W |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt (unofficial),
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/03/2013 |estreldate = 2013 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 6370778195927 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07B1HX637 |asin_country = CA |asin2 = B018955PB6 |asin_country2 = JP |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Unex DNXA-97 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9287; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Check Point L-50W - 8 Port Gigabit Firewall Appliance :CPAP-SG1140-NGTP-W-FCCA :CPAP-SG620-FW-W-WORLD
